text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Exactly!  By the way, i live in Arizona, @abc15 , the Coronavirus is going UP dramatically!  We don't Need or want Rallies in Arizona when we have Coronavirus spreading!   Please Do Not come to Arizona and make things so much worse!  THINK!
